title: Church with steeple still bank
marks:
Inscription

on roof: [Mr. Hain/ Senior/ Boys];
description: amber wood, three black outlined long pointed windows on each side; black outlined door with roof, handle, black outlined rose window above door; black writing on left side of roof: \"Mr. Hain Senior Boys\"; black outlined tent with letters \"LA\" on right side of roof; thin board slides from center base; round hole in base; coin slot beneath roof on back
